author: Odeinoichus
title: The LEGACY era has begun.
review:
Set #30533 Sam-X: I am not up to date on current Ninjago characters, so I have no idea if this is meant to be a micro model of Samurai X’s armor or if it is meant to be some kind of Minifigure scaled drone that Samurai X built to aid it in battle. Either way it’s a fun little model and we shall discuss the pros and cons of it before discussing final thoughts.

Pros:

  • Nice use of parts to create small scaled model.
  • Alternative pieces included for an alt model with six wheels.
  • Decent price-per-piece ratio.
  • Four shuriken included, one used on model, rest spares for Minifigures or clever MOC ideas.

Cons:

  • Alt model instructions only accessible with internet connection.
  • Difficult to find at retail in Canada, most Wal-Marts have sold out already.

Overall opinion

This is a very nice model, I don’t know if it’s a new character or a micro model. That being said it can work as either, let your imagination run wild. Sam-X is Minifigure sized, though not proportioned as it does have a thicker torso due to brick-building techniques. I’d recommend getting two if you want to display both model builds, but if you can’t at least get one as it makes for a very nice Polybag.
